title: Email/Password Sign Up Flow
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up using a valid email and password, receives an email confirmation, and can confirm their email.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign Up page
Input a valid email address and a secure password
Submit the sign up form
Check that a confirmation email is sent to the provided email address
Open the confirmation email and click the email confirmation link
Verify that the email confirmation is successful and user is redirected to sign in or dashboard

title: Email/Password Sign In with Confirmed User
description: Verify that a user with a confirmed email can sign in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page
Input previously registered email and correct password
Submit the sign in form
Verify that the user is signed in and redirected to their dashboard or homepage

title: Email/Password Sign In with Unconfirmed User
description: Verify that a user who has not confirmed their email cannot sign in and is prompted to confirm their email.

steps.description: Attempt to sign in with an email that has not been confirmed and valid password
Verify that sign in is blocked and user receives a message to confirm their email address

title: Google OAuth Sign Up and Sign In
description: Verify that a user can sign up and sign in using Google OAuth integration successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page
Click the Google Sign In button
Complete Google OAuth authentication flow
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to profile completion or dashboard

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify that users can trigger a password reset email, receive it, and change their password to regain access.

steps.description: Navigate to the Reset Password page
Input registered email address and submit password reset request
Check that password reset email is sent
Open the password reset email and follow the link to the reset page
Input and confirm a new valid password
Verify that password reset is successful and user can sign in with new password

title: User Profile Completion Flow Mandates Blood Group and Location
description: Verify that after authentication users are forced to complete their profile including mandatory fields: blood group and location before accessing dashboard.

steps.description: Sign in as a new user or OAuth authenticated user with incomplete profile
Verify redirection to profile completion page
Attempt to submit profile form without selecting blood group or location
Check validation errors are shown for missing mandatory fields
Fill in valid blood group and location and submit the form
Verify successful profile completion and redirection to dashboard

title: Profile Management: Update and Delete
description: Verify that authenticated users can update their profile details and delete their profile with proper confirmations and data changes.

steps.description: Navigate to the Profile Management page while signed in
Edit profile fields such as name, blood group, contact info, and save changes
Verify that the updated profile details are saved and displayed correctly
Initiate profile deletion and confirm the action
Verify profile is deleted and user is logged out and redirected appropriately

title: Blood Request CRUD Operations with Filters and Pagination
description: Verify users can create, read, update, and delete blood requests with correct functioning of filtering by urgency and blood group, search, and pagination.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to the Create Blood Request page
Create a new blood request with valid details including urgency, blood group, hospital location, and contact info
Verify the new blood request appears in the blood request feed
Use filtering options to filter requests by blood group and urgency
Verify that only matching requests are displayed
Use search functionality to find requests by hospital or requester name
Verify that search results are accurate
Navigate through paginated blood requests list
Verify correct items are displayed per page and pagination updates correctly
Update an existing blood request details
Verify updated request details are saved and displayed
Delete a blood request
Verify the request is removed from the list

title: Donor Registration and Availability Toggle Real-time Update
description: Verify users can register as donors, toggle availability status, and that these changes reflect immediately in donor search results and real-time updates.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to Donor Registration page
Fill in donor registration form with valid blood group and location and submit
Verify donor is registered and appears in donor list
Toggle donor availability OFF
Verify donor is marked unavailable and no longer appears in available donors list in real-time
Toggle donor availability ON
Verify donor reappears in donor search and availability status updates instantly across sessions

title: Donor Search with Filters and Real-time Status Indicator
description: Verify the donor search function filters by blood group and location correctly and real-time updates reflect availability changes with status indicators.

steps.description: Navigate to Find Donors page
Input filter criteria such as blood group and location and perform search
Verify that donor list reflects only matching donors
Observe real-time status indicators for donor availability
Simulate donor toggling availability and ensure status indicators update instantly

title: Homepage Components Rendering and Data Accuracy
description: Verify that all homepage components (hero section, trusted companies, urgent requests, impact stats, testimonials, educational content) render correctly and show accurate up-to-date information.

steps.description: Open the homepage
Verify hero section loads with correct text and call-to-action
Verify trusted companies logos are displayed
Verify urgent blood requests are listed with correct details
Verify donation impact statistics are displayed and numerically accurate
Verify testimonials are visible and formatted correctly
Verify educational content sections render with text and images

title: Navigation, Layout Responsiveness, Theme Toggling, and Error Boundary Handling
description: Verify the header and footer navigation links work correctly across screen sizes, theme toggle changes UI correctly, and error boundaries catch UI errors gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate through all header and footer links across multiple pages
Verify navigation works correctly without broken links
Resize viewport to mobile, tablet, and desktop layouts
Verify layout adapts and remains usable and visually consistent
Toggle theme from light to dark and vice versa
Verify all UI components update styling accordingly without glitches
Force a runtime error in a component to trigger error boundary
Verify error boundary catches error and displays fallback UI gracefully

title: Security: Database Access Rules Enforcement
description: Verify that database operations enforce Row Level Security (RLS) policies and users cannot access or modify data they do not own.

steps.description: Authenticate as User A and attempt to access User B's profile, blood requests, or donor entries directly via API or UI
Verify access is denied or no data is returned
Attempt unauthorized update or deletion on another user's data
Verify that database operation is rejected and no changes occur

title: Real-time Subscription Reliability for Donor Status Updates
description: Verify that real-time subscriptions to donor availability updates reliably deliver status changes and update UI components instantly.

steps.description: Open donor list in one session
In another session, toggle donor availability status
Verify that the UI updates instantly in the first session reflecting donor status changes

title: Additional Pages Accessibility and Content Validation
description: Verify that About, Contact, and 404 Not Found pages are accessible from navigation or direct URL and display correct content without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the About page
Verify About page content loads and displays correctly
Navigate to the Contact page
Verify Contact page content and contact form UI are correct
Navigate to an undefined route to trigger 404
Verify 404 Not Found page is displayed with appropriate messaging and navigation options
